scripts.dev-all: concurrently "npm run watch --prefix wp-content/themes/LSNewsroom/" "npm run watch --prefix wp-content/plugins/ls-main-slider" "npm run watch --prefix wp-content/plugins/ls-recommend-tags"
scripts.prod-all: concurrently "npm run prod --prefix wp-content/themes/LSNewsroom/" "npm run prod --prefix wp-content/plugins/ls-main-slider" "npm run prod --prefix wp-content/plugins/ls-recommend-tags"
